title: Personal Portfolio
shortDescription: A modern personal portfolio to showcase projects with a responsive design and advanced Angular components.
description: This project is my personal portfolio built as a Single Page Application (SPA) with Angular 19. It includes dynamic sections for projects, skills and contact information. No external backend is used â€” data is served from a local JSON file and business logic is handled by an Angular service for simplicity and fast iteration.
objectif: Present my projects and skills in a professional, result-focused way.
Deliver a modern, responsive and accessible design that works across devices.
Implement a clean client-side data flow using a local JSON data source and Angular services.
Demonstrate advanced Angular, SCSS and state-management best practices.
results: Delivered a production-ready portfolio that increased my online visibility and made my work easier to evaluate for recruiters. The client-side architecture (JSON + service) enabled fast updates, predictable behavior, and simplified deployment without a backend.
whatLearned: Designed maintainable Angular components and clear parent-child communication using Input/Output.
Built a robust client-side data flow using a local JSON file and Angular services to simulate an API.
Improved performance and responsiveness across devices through SCSS optimizations and lazy-loading strategies.
Adopted best practices for building modular, testable SPAs ready for future backend integration.
